title: Photoshop Speed Painting - 양과 여우들의 밤  The Night of sheep and foxes

json.text: how... are you...?

I missed... my deers alot.. 
(Shal.E's nicknames to his sub/followers.)
hehe gross
The main character in this drawing is Visla 'v'
I was originally going to draw the drinks manually
but I wasn't confident enough so I decided to use an image.
The reason I asked if anyone had a night shift part time job on twitter was this. Someone offered so I was able to get this reference. hehe
I wanted to make the drawing more life-like and that the viewer is next to Visla but,
as the work time got longer, there were many things I was not satisfied with ..
I think my initial sketch was the main problem
I was getting used to starting with a silhouette but I think it's important to not to leave out key points in complicated drawings, especially with a background.
The more I work on a drawing, it slowly starts to drain me and I just want to quickly finish the piece.
I like how the ears turned out in this drawing!
Actually I was contemplating to change her top color because yellow looked a bit childish
But I am glad I did not change it. It stands out very well.
Some adjustment were needed to make to match the perspective of the drawing.
You guys can't see it because I edited but, I unexpectedly opened maplestory and leveled for 3 hrs.
I like zero
I wanted to put some words on her clothes but thought it would be awkward if you read it. So I ended up putting random designs and it's meh.

Drawing the fishnet stockings took forever.
Next time I will just download a bush ㅠㅠ

The quality of the hands may look great but it's my hand with just some touch ups.
This hand was most disappointing part of the piece.
I practiced a lot from my previous drawing, but for me I think that the hands are very difficult to draw.
So I worked very hard on this hand.
With some lacking points but also learning a lot, "The night of sheep and foxes" is finished 'v'

See you guys soon in the next video!
I need to upload quickly and do my dailies
everyone bye bye~
Hate coke. Love pepsi.
